オプション1:
Star Man woke up.
It seemed that several hours had passed.

(Ah... right. I ended up on a deserted island...
Is it evening? Or morning? My whole body hurts...)

Sunburned and sore, Star Man’s body was in terrible shape.
He summoned all his willpower and stood up.
Star Man looked toward the ocean.

(Yesterday, there was rainwater pooled in the rocks, but I can’t count on that every time... I need to come up with something...
...
I’ll try looking for a river.)
Star Man looked around, but he couldn’t find a river.
(I see something like a path in the forest.)
Star Man decided to follow the path into the forest.
